{{ product.price | currency }}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/shared/models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-item', templateUrl: './product-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-item.component.scss'] }) export class ProductItemComponent { @Input() product?: Product; }
